alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:53AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Bernard, St. Charles, Orleans, northwestern Lafourche, northwestern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 545 AM CST... At 453 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ama, or near Avondale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Avondale, Metairie, Hahnville, Marrero, Harvey, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Luling, Poydras, River Ridge, Boutte and Ama. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 218 and 255. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
